page.title: 05RECREATION 1
page.content: The villages of Hothfield & Westwell have much in common. Summer fetes are held each year,flower & vegetable shows & a Christmas Market. Harvest Suppers are well attended in the village halls with carol singing near Christmas. Gymkhanas & carnivals are popular & money is raised for charity & village hall funds. Hobbies include soft furnishings,upholstery,carpentry, home decorating,sculpture,dressmaking, weaving & spinning,tapestry,patchwork, painting,knitting,flower arranging & pressing, & activities such as tennis, swimming, football & cricket. Most men & women are health conscious; jogging, walking & attending keep-fit classes & slimming clubs.The villages have choirs & produce musical shows in their village halls and away.
